resource_dependency.financialDataAPI: RESTful API endpoint returning structured financial data per company

function: Display aggregated financial data from multiple companies in a centralized dashboard.
static_description: The dashboard presents a grid of cards, each representing a company with its logo (companyLogoImage), name, and key financial metrics such as revenue, profit, and expenses. The background color is set to mint cream (#F5FFFA) and all UI components use teal (#008080) for styling.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a company card navigates the user to the detailed financial page for that company.
Hovering over a metric highlights it temporarily and shows a tooltip with additional context.

function: Aggregate financial data from various company sources via backend services.
static_description: This backend module exposes an endpoint (/api/v1/companies/financials) which fetches and aggregates raw financial data stored in a PostgreSQL database configured through environment variables.

resource_dependency.postgresSchemaDefinition: CREATE TABLE companies (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP); CREATE TABLE financial_records (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, company_id INT REFERENCES companies(id), date DATE, revenue NUMERIC, profit NUMERIC, expenses NUMERIC);

function: Establish connection to PostgreSQL database using provided credentials and define schema for storing company and financial record data.
static_description: A PostgreSQL database instance initialized with tables named 'companies' and 'financial_records'. Table structures are defined by postgresSchemaDefinition.

function: Enable users to navigate and view detailed financial records of individual companies.
static_description: A dedicated page for each company displaying historical charts and tabular financial data retrieved from the API route specified in companySpecificFinancialDataEndpoint. Navigation to this page occurs when clicking on a company card.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting different time ranges updates the displayed chart and table data dynamically without reloading the page.

resource_dependency.exportPDFService: Integration with PDF generation library or external service

function: Generate consolidated financial reports summarizing performance across all registered companies.
static_description: A report panel showing total revenues, profits, and expenses summed across all companies. It includes options to download the full report in PDF format using exportPDFService.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Download Report' generates a downloadable PDF file containing consolidated financial summaries.

function: Allow side-by-side comparison of selected financial metrics between multiple companies.
static_description: A bar or line chart rendered within comparisonChartComponent that visualizes comparative financial data fetched from crossCompanyComparisonEndpoint. Metrics and companies can be selected via dropdown menus above the chart.

interaction_and_states.description: Changing selections in the metric or company dropdowns re-fetches and redraws the chart accordingly.

function: Provide tools for authorized users to manage and modify existing financial entries.
static_description: Each financial entry listed under a company's profile includes icons for editing, deleting, or adding new records. These actions trigger corresponding API calls to endpoints like updateFinancialRecordEndpoint.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the edit icon opens a modal form pre-filled with current values for modification.
Clicking the delete icon prompts a confirmation dialog before sending DELETE request to deleteFinancialRecordEndpoint.
Clicking the add icon reveals an inline form for entering new financial data.

function: Support generation and exporting of custom financial reports in multiple formats.
static_description: A section with buttons labeled 'Export as PDF' and 'Export as CSV', linked to generateReportEndpoint with query parameters specifying desired format.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking either export button initiates a server-side report generation process and returns a downloadable file.

function: Implement secure login system to control access to sensitive dashboard features.
static_description: A standalone login page accessible at /auth/login featuring username and password fields, connected to authenticationAPI for validation.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon successful submission, JWT token is issued and used for subsequent requests requiring authorization.

resource_dependency.metricDataSources: Endpoints providing time-series data for visualization

function: Render interactive visualizations of key financial indicators.
static_description: Multiple embedded graphs throughout the dashboard built using visualizationLibrary, displaying trends like monthly revenue growth or expense distribution.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over points or bars reveals tooltips with exact numerical values.
Clicking legend items toggles visibility of respective datasets in the graph.

function: Ensure consistent responsive layout and theming aligned with brand guidelines.
static_description: All pages utilize responsiveCSSFramework to adapt layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop views while applying theme settings from themeConfigurationFile.

function: Fetch latest financial updates in real-time from backend to keep frontend synchronized.
static_description: Frontend establishes WebSocket connection via realTimeWebSocketConnection upon load to receive live updates. Falls back to polling every 60 seconds if WebSocket fails.

resource_dependency.multiTenantIsolationStrategy: Separate database schemas or row-level security policies

function: Structure application logic to ensure strict separation of data among tenants (i.e., companies).
static_description: Backend enforces tenant isolation by inspecting X-Tenant-ID headers and routing queries to appropriate scoped data layers according to multiTenantIsolationStrategy.

function: Provide administrative interface for configuring and managing external data sources.
static_description: Accessible only to admin users, this panel lists all active data sources and provides forms for adding, modifying, or removing connections managed via manageDataSourceAPI.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Add Source' opens a wizard guiding administrators through setup steps.

resource_dependency.installScriptCommand: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
resource_dependency.devStartCommand: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"

function: Define package.json scripts to streamline installation and development startup processes.
static_description: Two top-level NPM commands added to root package.json: 'install:all' executes installScriptCommand and 'dev' runs devStartCommand to launch both frontend and backend simultaneously.
